meta.description: Determine 4 out of 5 workers to complete one of the four tasks, minimizing total working hours.

sets.name: WORKERS
sets.description: Set of workers available for task assignment.

sets.name: TASKS
sets.description: Set of tasks to be completed.

params.name: time
params.description: Time required for each worker to complete each task.

vars.name: x
vars.description: Binary variable indicating if a worker is assigned to a task.

objective.name: min_total_cost
objective.expr: sum(time[w][t] * x[w][t] for w in WORKERS for t in TASKS)
objective.description: Minimize the total working hours for task assignments.

constraints.name: task_assignment_A
constraints.description: Exactly one worker must be assigned to task A.

constraints.name: task_assignment_B
constraints.description: Exactly one worker must be assigned to task B.

constraints.name: task_assignment_C
constraints.description: Exactly one worker must be assigned to task C.

constraints.name: task_assignment_D
constraints.description: Exactly one worker must be assigned to task D.

constraints.name: worker_limit
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(x[w][t] for w in WORKERS for t in TASKS)
constraints.description: Only 4 workers can be assigned to tasks.
